refnamediv.refpurpose: Repeat some text some number of times

example.title: A contrived demonstration that works for any XML input
example.programlisting:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" >
<xsl:output method="xml" media-type="text/xml" omit-xml-declaration="no" />
<xsl:import href="/lib/iovar/strings.xsl"/>
<xsl:template match="/"> <foobar> <xsl:call-template name="string-repeat"> <xsl:with-param name="text" select="'Hello World'"/> <xsl:with-param name="count" select="5"/> </xsl:call-template> </foobar> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>
example.screen: <?xml version="1.0"?> <foobar>Hello WorldHello WorldHello WorldHello WorldHello World</foobar>
